import pandas as pd
from datetime import datetime

"""
df = inputs[0]
df['datetime'] = pd.to_datetime(df['datetime'])

idx1 = df.loc[(df['datetime'] >= '2021-04-01 11:20:00') &(df['datetime'] <= '2021-04-05 08:10')].index
df.drop(idx1, inplace=True)

idx2 = df.loc[(df['datetime'] >= '2021-07-12 16:30:00') &(df['datetime'] <= '2021-07-13 09:00')].index
df.drop(idx2, inplace=True)
idx3 = df.loc[(df['datetime'] >= '2021-04-16 20:20:00') &(df['datetime'] <= '2021-04-27 14:20')].index
df.drop(idx3, inplace=True)
idx4 = df.loc[(df['datetime'] >= '2021-11-06 10:20:00') &(df['datetime'] <= '2021-11-08 09:40')].index
df.drop(idx4, inplace=True)
idx5 = df.loc[(df['datetime'] >= '2021-11-08 19:20:00') &(df['datetime'] <= '2021-11-09 10:40')].index
df.drop(idx5, inplace=True)

idx6 = df.loc[(df['datetime'] >= '2021-11-18 08:20:00') &(df['datetime'] <= '2021-11-23 09:50')].index
df.drop(idx6, inplace=True)
#idx6 = df.loc[(df['datetime'] >= '2021-11-18 08:20:00') &(df['datetime'] <= '2021-12-01 20:00')].index
#df.drop(idx6, inplace=True)

idx7 = df.loc[(df['datetime'] >= '2021-08-23 16:30:00') &(df['datetime'] <= '2021-08-24 07:00')].index
df.drop(idx7, inplace=True)
#idx8 = df.loc[(df['datetime'] >= '2021-11-13 05:50:00') &(df['datetime'] <= '2021-11-15 11:10')].index
#df.drop(idx8, inplace=True)
#idx9 = df.loc[(df['datetime'] >= '2021-11-16 02:30:00') &(df['datetime'] <= '2021-11-16 13:30')].index
#df.drop(idx9, inplace=True)

df['datetime'] = df['datetime'].astype('str')
"""

df = inputs[0]
df['datetime'] = pd.to_datetime(df['datetime'])

df = df.loc[
  ~((df['datetime'] >= datetime(2021,4,1)) & (df['datetime'] <= datetime(2021,4,6)))
  & ~((df['datetime'] >= datetime(2021,7,12)) & (df['datetime'] <= datetime(2021,7,14)))
  & ~((df['datetime'] >= datetime(2021,11,5)) & (df['datetime'] <= datetime(2021,11,9)))
  & ~((df['datetime'] >= datetime(2021,11,18)) & (df['datetime'] <= datetime(2021,12,2)))
]
df['datetime'] = df['datetime'].astype('str')

import pandas as pd

df = inputs[0]

df.set_index(pd.to_datetime(df['datetime']), inplace=True)
df_1h = df.resample(rule='1H').mean()
df_1h = df_1h.reset_index()
df_1h['datetime'] = df_1h['datetime'].astype(str)

import pandas as pd
from datetime import datetime

df = inputs[0]
df['datetime'] = pd.to_datetime(df['datetime'])

df = df.loc[
  ~((df['datetime'] >= datetime(2021,4,1)) & (df['datetime'] <= datetime(2021,4,6)))
  & ~((df['datetime'] >= datetime(2021,7,12)) & (df['datetime'] <= datetime(2021,7,13)))
  & ~((df['datetime'] >= datetime(2021,11,5)) & (df['datetime'] <= datetime(2021,11,9)))
  & ~((df['datetime'] >= datetime(2021,11,17)) & (df['datetime'] <= datetime(2021,12,2)))
]
df['datetime'] = df['datetime'].astype('str')

param.script:
#
#   NOTE : Enter "Out Table Alias"
#   ex)
#       inputDataframe = inputs[0]
#       result = inputDataframe
#
df = inputs[0]
df = df[(df['datetime'] < '2022-05-01')]

#일정기간 동안 계속 traget값이 0인 것들
idx = df[(df['datetime']>='2021-04-16 21:00:00')&(df['datetime']<='2021-04-27 13:00:00')].index
df.drop(idx, inplace=True)
idx2 = df[(df['datetime']>='2021-09-10 13:00:00')&(df['datetime']<='2021-09-12 01:00:00')].index
df.drop(idx2, inplace=True)
idx3 = df[(df['datetime']>='2021-01-28 18:00:00')&(df['datetime']<='2021-01-29 08:00:00')].index
df.drop(idx3, inplace=True)
idx5 = df[(df['datetime']>='2020-12-09 13:00:00')&(df['datetime']<='2020-12-09 22:00:00')].index
df.drop(idx5, inplace=True)

# 풍속은 매우 강한데 target값은 0또는 너무 낮은 값들
idx4 = df[(df['windspeed']>8)&(df['target']<=2500)].index
df.drop(idx4, inplace=True)
#df = df[df['datetime']> '2020-12-01']

param.script:
#
#   NOTE : Enter "Out Table Alias"
#   ex)
#       inputDataframe = inputs[0]
#       result = inputDataframe
#
import pandas as pd

def changeFahrenheit(x):
  return x*(9/5) + 32

df = inputs[0]
df['WW'] = df['winddirection'] * df['windspeed']
df['HT'] = df['humidity'] * df['temperature']
df['PP'] = df['precipitationprob']*df['precipitationform']
#df = df.replace({'temperature':0},0.00000000001)
df['fTemp'] = df['temperature'].apply(changeFahrenheit)
df['density'] = df['pressure']/df['fTemp']
df['pt'] = df['pressure'] * df['temperature']
df['pt_1'] = df['pressure'] * df['fTemp']


def get_dircat(x):
    if x < 90:
        return 1
    elif (x >= 90)&(x < 180):
        return 2
    elif (x >= 180)&(x < 270):
        return 3
    else:
        return 4  
df['wind4'] = df['winddirection'].apply(get_dircat)

def mean_speed(x):
    list=[]
    i=0.25
    while i<=25.5:
        list.append(i)
        i+=0.5
        
    for i in list:
        if x < i:
            x=i-0.25
            return x
#df['mean_windspeed'] = df['windspeed'].apply(mean_speed)

param.script:
#
#   NOTE : Enter "Out Table Alias"
#   ex)
#       inputDataframe = inputs[0]
#       result = inputDataframe

import pandas as pd

df = inputs[0]

df['temp'] = round(df['temperature'])

#df_1 = inputs[1] # 포화수증기량 데이터
#dict_1 = dict(zip(df_1['temp'], df_1['satu_water'])) # 습도 * 포화수증기량
#df['full_humidity'] =df['temp'].map(dict_1) # 수증기량
#df['satu_water'] = df['full_humidity'] * df['humidity']

def changeFahrenheit(x):
  return x*(9/5) + 32

df['fTemp'] = df['temperature'].apply(changeFahrenheit)
df['HsT'] = df['humidity'] / df['fTemp']

def changeFahrenheit(x):
  return x*(9/5) + 32

df['WW'] = df['winddirection'] * df['windspeed']
df['PP'] = df['precipitationprob']*df['precipitationform']
df['temperature'] = df['temperature'].apply(changeFahrenheit)
df['HT'] = df['humidity'] * df['temperature']
def get_dircat(x):
    if x < 90:
        return 1
    elif (x >= 90)&(x < 180):
        return 2
    elif (x >= 180)&(x < 270):
        return 3
    else:
        return 4  
df['wind4'] = df['winddirection'].apply(get_dircat)

param.script:
#
#   NOTE : Enter "Out Table Alias"
#   ex)
#       inputDataframe = inputs[0]
#       result = inputDataframe
#
import numpy as np

# Define NMAE loss function
def NMAE(observed, pred, nominal):
    absolute_error = np.abs(observed - pred)
    absolute_error /= nominal
    target_idx = np.where(observed >= nominal*0.1)

    return 100 * absolute_error[target_idx].mean()
  
  
df = inputs[0]

err = NMAE(df['target'].values, df['prediction'].values, 16000)

import numpy as np

# Define NMAE loss function
def NMAE(observed, pred, nominal):
    absolute_error = np.abs(observed - pred)
    absolute_error /= nominal
    target_idx = np.where(observed >= nominal*0.1)

    return 100 * absolute_error[target_idx].mean()
  
  
df = inputs[0]

err = NMAE(df['target'].values, df['prediction'].values, 1100)
